summary:
Raini Studios Token ($RST) - Read more about how our studio's fungible token will power everything within The Lords of Light and beyond.

 Epic Games Store - Official launch partner; has published The Lords of Light on the Epic Game Store storefront, and has approved Raini Studios for further game launches on their platform.

 Merit Circle - Investor in and primary marketing partner of Raini Studios. Merit Circle has built and are providing the Beam blockchain on which The Lords of Light lives.

 LayerZero - Enabling the transition of Raini Studios and The Lords of Light to an omni-chain offering, with the ability to bridge $RST and NFT's between more than 30 different chains.

 Ava Labs - As the official creator of the Avalanche blockchain and Avalanche subnets, Ava Labs invested in Raini Studios via their ecosystem fund, Blizzard, and provides Raini Studios with significant ongoing marketing support.

 Leonardo.Ai - Shares a co-founder with Raini Studios. Provides us with priority access to revolutionary features, unlimited support and significant exposure.
